item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 18, 2025 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Plane crashes, overturns during landing at Toronto airport (140 points | 177 comments)

26. NLRB acting general counsel rescinds non-compete labor policy (106 points | 54 comments)
27. Large Language Models Show Concerning Tendency to Flatter Users (34 points | 27 comments)
28. Barcoding brains (14 points | 4 comments)
29. 'Honestly terrifying': Yosemite National Park is in chaos (57 points | 22 comments)
